snippet.title: Drive 4 Survival - official teaser
snippet.description:
Drive 4 Survival is a struggle for survival in the frozen wilderness, where you only need to rely on yourself and your car. Try to survive and find the last remnants of the unfrozen world.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1206670/Drive_4_Survival/
